content:
For the moment you obviously need to rely on server-side filters or desktop Thunderbird (or some other client). Certainly add your voice for this request at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

FYI in the future you will want to post android support questions at https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/thunderbird-android
creator: wsmwk
